'''Key''' is a Quest Item obtained in various [[Event Quest]]s.

* "[[The Snowy Past]]" in the [[Version 2.3]] event, [[Shadows Amidst Snowstorms]].
* "[[Blazin' Trails (Part 1)|Blazin' Trails]]" in the [[Version 2.8]] event, [[Summertime Odyssey]].
